jobActions.name: Blizzard
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 180.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice or removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Fire
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 180.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire or removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: 40% chance next Fire III will cost no MP and have no cast time
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Transpose
jobActions.description: Swaps Astral Fire with a single Umbral Ice, or Umbral Ice with a single Astral Fire.

jobActions.name: Thunder
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 30.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 35
Duration: 21s
Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP
Duration: 40s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name: Blizzard II
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Scathe
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: 20% chance potency will double

jobActions.name: Fire II
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Enhanced Flare
Effect is canceled if Astral Fire ends.

jobActions.name: Thunder II
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 15
Duration: 18s
Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP
Duration: 40s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name: Manaward
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier that nullifies damage totaling up to 30% of maximum HP.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Manafont
jobActions.description: Restores 30% of maximum MP.

jobActions.name: Fire III
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 260.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Blizzard III
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 260.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Freeze
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Thunder III
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 35
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: 10% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP
Duration: 40s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name: Aetherial Manipulation
jobActions.description:
Rush to a target party member's side.
Unable to cast if bound.

jobActions.name: Flare
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 220 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.
Enhanced Flare Potency: 280
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.

jobActions.name: Ley Lines
jobActions.description:
Connects naturally occurring ley lines to create a circle of power which, while standing within it, reduces spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 15%.
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Sharpcast
jobActions.description:
Ensures the next Scathe, Fire, Paradox, or Thunder spell cast will, for the first hit, trigger Scathe's additional effect, Firestarter, or Thundercloud.
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Blizzard IV
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 310.
Additional Effect: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Fire IV
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 310.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.

jobActions.name: Between the Lines
jobActions.description:
Move instantly to Ley Lines drawn by you.
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Thunder IV
jobActions.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 50 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Lightning damage over time
Potency: 20
Duration: 18s
Additional Effect: 3% chance after each tick that the next Thunder spell of any grade will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP
Duration: 40s
Only one Thunder spell-induced damage over time effect per caster can be inflicted upon a single target.

jobActions.name: Triplecast
jobActions.description:
The next three spells will require no cast time.
Duration: 15s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Foul
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Polyglot Cost: 1

jobActions.name: Despair
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 340.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire.

jobActions.name: Umbral Soul
jobActions.description:
Grants Umbral Ice and 1 Umbral Heart.
Umbral Heart Bonus: Nullifies Astral Fire's MP cost increase for Fire spells and reduces MP cost for Flare by one-third
Can only be executed while under the effect of Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Xenoglossy
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 880.
Polyglot Cost: 1

jobActions.name: High Fire II
jobActions.description:
Deals fire damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Astral Fire III and removes Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Astral Fire Bonus: Grants Enhanced Flare
Effect is canceled if Astral Fire ends.

jobActions.name: High Blizzard II
jobActions.description:
Deals ice damage with a potency of 140 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Grants Umbral Ice III and removes Astral Fire
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Amplifier
jobActions.description:
Grants Polyglot.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.

jobActions.name: Paradox
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 500.
Astral Fire Bonus: Refreshes the duration of Astral Fire and 40% chance to grant Firestarter
Duration: 15s
Firestarter Effect: Next Fire III will require no time to cast and cost no MP
Duration: 30s
Umbral Ice Bonus: Spell is cast immediately, requires no MP to cast, and refreshes the duration of Umbral Ice
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Paradox.

â€»This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.name: Addle
roleActions.description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 5% and magic damage dealt by 10%.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Sleep
roleActions.description:
Puts target and all nearby enemies to sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.description:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.description:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.description:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

traits.name: Aspect Mastery
traits.description:
Casting of certain fire and ice spells will grant a stack of Astral Fire and Umbral Ice respectively.
Maximum Stacks: 1
Duration: 15s
While under the effect of either Astral Fire or Umbral Ice, casting a spell of the opposite element will consume no MP.
Effect does not apply to Flare.

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Aspect Mastery II
traits.description: Allows the stacking of a second Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.

traits.name: Thundercloud
traits.description:
Grants a 10% chance that after each damage over time tick inflicted by Thunder or Thunder III (3% for Thunder II or Thunder IV), the next Thunder, Thunder II, Thunder III, or Thunder IV will add its full damage over time amount to its initial damage, have no cast time, and cost no MP.
Duration: 40s

traits.name: Aspect Mastery III
traits.description:
Allows the stacking of a third Astral Fire and Umbral Ice.
Casting Fire II or Blizzard II grants maximum stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice respectively.
When maintaining three stacks of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice, the cast time of spells of the opposite element is halved.

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.description: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Firestarter
traits.description:
Grants a 40% chance that after casting Fire, your next Fire III will require no MP and have no cast time.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Thunder Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Thunder to Thunder III.

traits.name: Enochian
traits.description:
Increases damage dealt by 5% while under the effect of Astral Fire or Umbral Ice.
Upon successfully landing Fire II while under the effect of Astral Fire, grants Enhanced Flare.
Enhanced Flare effect ends if Astral Fire is lost.

traits.name: Enhanced Freeze
traits.description: Grants 3 Umbral Hearts upon casting Freeze.

traits.name: Thunder Mastery II
traits.description: Upgrades Thunder II to Thunder IV.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian
traits.description: Grants the effect of Polyglot upon maintaining Enochian for 30 seconds. Also improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 10%.

traits.name: Enhanced Sharpcast
traits.description: Reduces Sharpcast recast timer to 30 seconds.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian II
traits.description: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 15%.

traits.name: Enhanced Polyglot
traits.description: Allows the stacking of a second Polyglot.

traits.name: Enhanced Foul
traits.description: Allows for the immediate casting of Foul.

traits.name: Aspect Mastery IV
traits.description: Upgrades Fire II and Blizzard II to High Fire II and High Blizzard II.

traits.name: Enhanced Manafont
traits.description: Reduces Manafont recast time to 120 seconds.

traits.name: Enhanced Enochian III
traits.description: Improves Enochian's magic damage increase to 23%.

traits.name: Enhanced Sharpcast II
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Sharpcast.
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Aspect Mastery V
traits.description:
Adds a Paradox marker to your Elemental Gauge.
The marker is made active after reaching Astral Fire III then swapping to the opposite element. Conversely, the marker can also be made active after reaching Umbral Ice III and gaining 3 Umbral Hearts then swapping to the opposite element.
Blizzard and Fire become Paradox when the Paradox marker is made active.
